controller

Class SimulationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SimulationController

  • public class SimulationController
extends java.lang.Object
    The simulation controller manages all aspects of the controller. Is made up of several models and other classes located in the 'model' package.
    Author:
    John Humphrys
